passive.name: BLAZE
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) BLAZE
                                Brand's abilities set enemies Ablaze, dealing 3% of their max Health as magic damage over 4 seconds.Stacking Ablaze 3 times on champions and large monsters causes them to detonate after 2 seconds, dealing 10% (10% + 0.02% ) of each nearby enemy's max Health as magic damage.Enemies that detonate cannot stack Ablaze again within 4 seconds.

q.name: (Q) SEAR
q.description:
(Q) SEAR
 7,5/7/6,5/6s   50 
                                
                                
                                Launches a fireball that deals 80 magic damage (80/120/160/200 + 55% ) to the first enemy hit.Blaze: Sear stuns for 1.75 seconds if the target is ablaze.

w.name: (W) PILLAR OF FLAME
w.description:
(W) PILLAR OF FLAME
 9,5/9/8,5/8s   75/85/95/105 
                                
                                
                                After a short delay fire erupts at a location, dealing 70 magic damage (70/120/170/220 + 55% ) to enemies.Blaze: Pillar of Flame deals 30% more damage to enemies that are ablaze.

e.name: (E) CONFLAGRATION
e.description:
(E) CONFLAGRATION
 11/10/9/8s   75/80/85/90 
                                
                                
                                Ignites enemies near the target, dealing 60 magic damage (60/90/120/150 + 45% ).Blaze: Conflagration spreads farther if the target is ablaze.

r.name: (R) PYROCLASM
r.description:
(R) PYROCLASM
 70/65/60s   100 
                                
                                
                                Releases a torrent of flame that bounces up to 5 times between enemies or himself, each bound dealing 100 magic damage (100/200/300 + 30% ).Blaze: Pyroclasm briefly slows by 30/40/50% if the target is ablaze.Bounces attempt to max stack Blaze on champion.
